content.description:
Directions: Suggested time - 10 minutes

"Quid struis? Aut qua spe Libycis teris otia terris?

Si te nulla movet tantarum gloria rerum,

nec super ipse tua moliris laude laborem,

Ascanium surgentem et spes heredis Iuli

(5) respice, cui regnum Italiae Romanaque tellus

debetur."
content.question: Who is the speaker of these lines and what is the occasion of this speech to Aeneas?

frqParts.text: Who is the speaker of these lines and what is the occasion of this speech to Aeneas?

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
